billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

title: Includes services of department of correctional services in hazardous duty differential pay requirements
summary: Includes services of employees of the department of correctional services working in shock incarceration facilities with direct inmate contact within provisions relating to hazardous duty differentials.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to hazardous duty differentials
